You idiots that comment about the specifics of a movie should be SHOT.  If you want to rate the movie along with the torrent audio/video quality, fine, but don't ruin a movie for everyone else by talking about what you did or didn't like about it.  People look at the comments section of a torrent to see if it's fake or real, what the quality is, and if there are any problems with it.  They don't need some prepubescent prick ruining the movie for them.  If they want to read movie reviews and spoilers, that's what IMDB and a dozen other sites are for.
